text: Sergei Alexandrovich Solovyov (; 25 August 1944 – 13 December 2021) was a Russian movie director, producer, screenwriter, and actor. In 1975, he won the Silver Bear for Best Director at the 25th Berlin International Film Festival for his movie One Hundred Days After Childhood.
